Glossary
========
.. glossary::
    CIF
        `Crystallographic Information File <http://www.iucr.org/resources/cif>`_

    ellipsoid
        A three-dimensional object formed by rotating an ellipse.
        
    citation
        |citation|
        
    MBE
        Minimum Bounding Ellipsoid. The smallest volume :term:`ellipsoid` that can surround a set of points.
        
    GUI
        Graphical User Interface
